- [Evidently Blog](https://www.evidentlyai.com/blog) - All kinds of goodies.
	- [Which test is the best? We compared 5 methods to detect data drift on large datasets](https://www.evidentlyai.com/blog/data-drift-detection-large-datasets)

- [https://github.com/DataTalksClub/mlops-zoomcamp/tree/main/05-monitoring](https://github.com/DataTalksClub/mlops-zoomcamp/tree/main/05-monitoring) - Great videos.
